root.name: Scrabble Slam!
root.description: OverviewBased on the card game Scrabble Slam! It has up to 4-player competing to get rid of their hand as quickly before the other players can. The game is play by placing letter cards over an existing 4 letter word by replacing 1 of the letters with one of the cards in your hand.Released for DSi Ware for 500 points
